title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-4.9 - Change fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-4.9 - Change fund

State Regulations

For convenience in making change, an appropriate amount
may be withdrawn from the administration fund. The amount of cash in this fund
shall at all times be constant for the total amount established. Where more
than one person is authorized to accept monies, each shall be assigned a fund
for his or her sole use. Funds so established shall be used for change purposes
only and no expenditures shall be made therefrom. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1642-4.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
